channel.title: Be Unstoppable: The Essential Laws of Fearless Living
channel.description: Resolve any problem for good, outsmart fear, find your purpose, love your life.

image.title: Be Unstoppable: The Essential Laws of Fearless Living

channel.copyright: Copyright 2012: Guy Finley/Life of Learning Foundation. All Rights Reserved.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Be Unstoppable: The Essential Laws of Fearless Living
channel.itunes:summary: There are immense secrets about this life most will never know. You were meant to find them. And you CAN find them. The day you do, your life will take on a radical new direction... and you'll look back and realize it was the turning point that changed everything. Subscribe to Guy Finley's free podcasts today and discover the secrets of truly successful, fearless living.
channel.itunes:author: Guy Finley

item.title: A Special Mother's Day Message
item.description: In this short talk, Guy Finley talks about how we are all intended to understand the purpose of this life, which is to be a conscious participate in the moment-to-moment unfolding of this present moment.
item.content:encoded:
Show Notes:

In this short talk, Guy Finley talks about how we are all intended to understand the purpose of this life, which is to be a conscious participate in the moment-to-moment unfolding of this present moment.

item.itunes:keywords: rebirth, renewal, fulfillment, purpose, destiny, cycle of life, wasting time, waste your life

item.title: The Web of Life
item.description: In this short talk, Guy Finley talks about the life-saving wisdom of becoming aware of the various thoughts, feelings and states that move through us, rather than wasting our energy by resisting these movements.
item.content:encoded:
Show Notes:

In this short talk, Guy Finley talks about the life-saving wisdom of becoming aware of the various thoughts, feelings and states that move through us, rather than wasting our energy by resisting these movements.

item.title: Discover the Self of Many Colors
item.description: In this short talk, Guy Finley talks about how we are intended to discover that who we really are, our true self, is a multi-colored palette of extraordinary possibilities.
item.content:encoded:
